exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R b, m : R H : forall x : R, Rmin b b < x < Rmax b b -> m <= f x Unable to unify "Rbar" with "0 = 0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment f : R -> R a, b, m : R H : forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> m <= f x n : a <> b Unable to unify "is_lb_Rbar ?M2379 (Glb_Rbar ?M2379) /\\ (forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar ?M2379 b -> Rbar_le b (Glb_Rbar ?M2379))" with "Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) = Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b)".

original: intros. unfold is_finite, Inf_fct. destruct (Req_EM_T a b); intros. - subst. apply Finite. - apply Glb_Rbar_correct. intros y [x [H1 H2]]. specialize (H x). assert (Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) by lra. specialize (H H3). apply Rle_trans with (f x). + apply Inf_fct_le. auto. + apply H.
